thread.section_title: Holiday Inn New York City - Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, friendly staff.
thread.title_full: Great location, friendly staff. - Review of Holiday Inn New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Veevers84
title: Great location, friendly staff.
text:
Great location in the city an ideal starting point for most trips within the city.The room and facilities were of good standard and spacious.
I'd recommend a low floor as there are only two lifts. Our room also always seemed to be cleaned later rather than when we were out. Happy to give you towels on request though.
